message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. I believe it has the potential to bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. This is a fair price considering its worth to me is no less than $800000. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the value you mentioned it has to you.
